title: REQUORDIT INC Selected as Top 20 Construction Tech Solution Provider by CIOReview
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/7/2015 @ 1:59 PM   REQUORDIT INC 
CHICAGO, Oct. 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- CIOReview has released this September's Construction Technology Special identifying REQUORDIT INC as a solution leader in the article titled "20 Most Promising Tech Solution Providers 2015." CIOReview evaluated vendors' capability to fulfill the "need for cost-effective and flexible solutions that add value to the complex construction landscape." REQUORDIT, the Viewpoint and Hyland OnBase Premier Partner, provides a unique service to the construction industry that has garnered attention; the ability to organize mission-critical data, paperwork, architectural designs, and digital information for internal and external business processing. 
In the article, REQUORDIT President Mark Buckley highlights the impact of Enterprise Content Management (ECM) on improving the availability, organization, and management of information whilst integrating with construction-minded niche applications. Further, CIOReview makes note of the specialized integrations that REQUORDIT performs for Construction clients such as Viewpoint, SAP, JD Edwards and other Construction Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems. According to Buckley, "We do not replace the core systems that organizations use, but provide them an exceptional capability to collect and present information to people." 
REQUORDIT, is pleased to be recognized for empowering construction companies to automate workflows, decrease processing time, enforce policies and procedures and provide visibility into liabilities. "We have our sights set on becoming the highest quality construction ECM provider in the world," said Buckley referencing a focus on maps, real-time information, and dashboards. At present, REQUORDIT has expended operations to support deployments globally. REQUORDIT now supports Canada, US, Europe, and Latin America with plans to explore markets in Asia and India. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/requordit-inc-selected-as-top-20-construction-tech-solution-provider-by-cioreview-300156150.html
